entity.name: Gavin Newsom
entity.description: Candidate for Governor of California Gavin Newsom

text: @GavinNewsom We’re not out of the woods because California was bypassed by federal funding for COVID19 free testing. Less testing the higher the curve. Why is our governor not funding testing but is giving  money out to illegal immigrants? Open up our state!!! Pay for testing.
